 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּשׁ‎</span> **verb** ==knead== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לוּשׁ‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Eth <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: or <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַּתָּ֫לָשׁ‎</span> [[1Sam.28.24|1Sam 28:24]]; [[2Sam.13.8|2Sam 13:8]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ושׁ‎</span>-); ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל֫וּשִׁי‎</span> [[Gen.18.6|Gen 18:6]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלּוּשׁ‎</span> [[Hos.7.4|Hos 7:4]] ***Participle*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָשׁוֺת‎</span> [[Jer.7.18|Jer 7:18]] — ***knead*** (object not expressed = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶמַח סֹלֶת‎</span>) [[Gen.18.6|Gen 18:6]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), compare [[1Sam.28.24|1Sam 28:24]] object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּצֵק‎</span> ***dough*** [[Hos.7.4|Hos 7:4]]; [[Jer.7.18|Jer 7:18]] compare [[2Sam.13.8|2Sam 13:8]].
